block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Something simple today! This easy origami bird is Jack's Bird by Jack Geist. Really easy to make and could be folded in less than 2 minutes real time. Enjoy!!! Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

meta_description: Heap Art Origami tutorial, How to fold Jack’s Bird by Jack Geist
